question: List every product name and its price.
predicted_sql: Inscrire chaque nom, son prix, sa valeur, sa valeur, sa valeur;

question: Show the product with the highest revenue.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, total_revenue FROM (SELECT p.product_id, p.name, SUM(o.quantity * p.price) AS total_revenue FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.name) AS t ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 1;
predicted_sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products;

question: Show the total revenue per user.
sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, SUM(o.quantity * p.price) AS total_revenue FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.name;

question: Show orders placed after 2024-01-01.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2024-01-01';
predicted_sql: SELECT order_id, name, price FROM orders placed after 2024-01-01-01;

question: Show the average payment amount per payment method.
sql: SELECT payment_method, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM payments GROUP BY payment_method;

question: List all products that have never been ordered.
sql: SELECT p.product_id, p.name FROM products p LEFT JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_id IS NULL;
predicted_sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products;

question: Show the average product price per category.
sql: SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category;
predicted_sql: Indiquer le prix moyen du produit par cat√©gorie;

question: Show products that cost less than 20.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price < 20;

question: Find users whose name starts with 'A'.
sql: SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';

question: Which users have never placed an order?
sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.name FROM users u LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_id IS NULL;

question: Show products and how many different users ordered them.
sql: SELECT p.product_id, p.name, COUNT(DISTINCT o.user_id) AS num_users FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.name;

question: Show pending orders only.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'PENDING';
